deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text: @dev Modifier that checks that an account has {ADMIN_ROLE}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants {role} to {account}. If {account} had not been already granted {role}, emits a {RoleGranted} event.

params.account: - Account to grant role to. Note: This function can only be called by the admin.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes {role} from {account}. If {account} had been granted {role}, emits a {RoleRevoked} event.

params.account: - Account to revoke role from. Note: This function can only be called by the admin.
